metadata.title: CVE-2018-16808 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in Dolibarr through 7.0.0. There is Stored XSS inexpensereport/card.php in the expense reports plugin via the commentsparameter, or a public or private note.

criterions.comment: dolibarr: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
